title: My digital nomad packing list
snippet:
The new normal is boosting the number of remote workers, and it is here to stay! 🥳
If you are a traveling remote worker, you'll want to consider using one carry-on size backpack for all of your stuff. They are usually up to around 40L depending on the...

title: 5 MacOS tips to boost your productivity
snippet:
Reducing the time doing stuff you do regularly is necessary if you want to get shit done. It's called being productive. Start small and find shortcuts to the thing you do the most.

Next level is automating predictive tasks. But that's for another post....

title: ÅÄÖ characters in Eloquent Sluggable
snippet:
In Sweden, we have three letters that might look weird to you: Å, Ä and Ö, so this post is mainly for Swedes.

Usually, you don't want to use these characters in, for example, slugs. Therefore most slug generators will translate Å to A, Ä to A and...

title: An awesome tool to find domain names
snippet:
Domain names are in high demand and it's a huge business buying and selling them. To find your own domain name can be super difficult if not impossible.

I recently discovered that you can use a more advanced search at Namecheap. They call it Beast mode...

title: Custom 404 page for Jigsaw in Laravel Forge
snippet: This site is built with Tightens Jigsaw and runs on Laravel Forge. The 404 page did not work out of the box. Tighten tells you to add error_page 404 /404; to the Nginx config. That is true. But it does not work in Forge. The solution is to...

title: Cloudflare actually slows your website down
snippet:
So I've almost always used Cloudflare for my personal websites. Recently I started asking my self why? Is it better than just a DNS?

I don't need the security, DDOS protection, caching, auto minify or Rocket Loader. And I don't care that you can see my...

title: About my domain name

title: Fetch media from production to local environment
snippet: Why download images and other heavy resources to your local computer, when you have them available to the public? This does not only save space on your local hard drive. It saves a lot of time syncing resources from production to your local environment....

snippet:

title: Thatsup Website CMS
snippet:
CMS for the lifestyle and restaurant company Thatsup.

Websites are backend rendered with Laravel.
Admin backend is built with Laravel and frontend with Vue.JS.

title: Visited countries map
snippet:

50.000+ cities
192 countries
Copy country flags as emojis
